A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a terrible movie. It gets 1 star for visual effects\, but the rest of the movie is an abomination and destroys every important thing about the Star Wars universe. The prequels gave us Jar-Jar and Midichlorians...but we had great characters added to the the universe as well. The Force Awakens was pan by many\, but it did open up the opportunity to explore so many aspects of the Force and the SW universe. But Disney took this amazing Universe and crapped all over it and its fans. The Last Jedi is an abomination of a movie. Disney sucks the life out of everything it touches.
